Main di Pinggir Kali Cipinang Saat Hujan Deras, Bocah Hanyut Terseret Arus
05 Nov 2019, 23:46 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - Seorang bocah laki-laki berusia 10 tahun hanyut di Kali Cipinang, Jakarta Timur. Hingga saat ini, korban belum ditemukan dan pencariannya dilanjutkan esok hari.
"Usianya sekitar 10 tahun, laki-laki. Hasil pencariannya belum ditemukan, dilanjutkan esok hari. Malam ini pencarian dihentikan, karena sudah lebih dari empat jam," kata petugas komunikasi Sudin Penanggulangan Kebakaran dan Penyelamatan (PKP) Jaktim, Gatot Sulaiman, saat dikonfirmasi, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Petugas menerima laporan kejadian hanyutnya korban sekitar pukul 18.45 WIB. Korban diduga terbawa arus saat tercebur ke kali.
"Pada saat hujan deras, koban bermain bersama temannya di kali sekitar rumah, kemudian korban melompat ke kali dan langsung hilang karena arusnya deras," jelas Gatot.
Petugas telah menyisir Kali Cipinang dari lokasi terceburnya korban yang berada di Jalan Panca Warga, Cipinang Besar Selatan hingga ke pintu air Banjir Kanal Timur (BKT). Korban diduga hanyut di kali yang lebarnya sekitar dua meter itu.
"(Pencarian) dari awal dia tercebur sampai ke pintu air BKT. Karena itu kan kali kecil, itu ukurannya dua meter. Karena posisi hujan deras, arusnya deras, jadi walaupun kali lebarnya dua meter tapi arusnya deras. Kalau pas pencarian ini karena sudah nggak hujan (dalamnya) 30 cm, pas hujan lebih dari itu," tuturnya.
Belum ada informasi mengenai identitas korban. Petugas akan melanjutkan pencarian esok hari dengan dibantu pihak terkait.
"Pencarian dilanjutkan besok. Pihak pemadam dibantu (petugas) 112, pihak terkait lah," pungkasnya.

Playing on the banks of the Cipinang River during heavy rains, the boy was swept away by the current
05 Nov 2019, 23:46 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - A 10-year-old boy drifted in Cipinang River, East Jakarta. Until now, the victim has not been found and the search continues tomorrow.
"He is about 10 years old, male. The results of the search have not been found, continued tomorrow. Tonight the search was stopped, because it has been more than four hours," said the East Jakarta Fire and Rescue (PKP) Sub-dept. Of Communication and Communication Officer Gatot Sulaiman, when confirmed. , Tuesday (5/11/2019).
Officers received a report of the victim's drifting incident around 18:45 WIB. The victim is suspected to be carried away by the current when plunged into the river.
"During heavy rains, koban plays with his friend around the house, then the victim jumps into the river and immediately disappears due to heavy currents," Gatot explained.
Officers have combed the Cipinang River from the location of the victim who was on Jalan Panca Warga, Cipinang Besar Selatan to the flood gate of the East Canal Flood (BKT). The victim was allegedly washed away at a river about two meters wide.
"(Searching) from the beginning he plunged up to the BKT floodgates. Because it was a small river, it was two meters in size. Because of the heavy rain position, the current was heavy, so even though the time was two meters wide, the current was heavy. rain (depth) 30 cm, when it rains more than that, "he said.
There is no information regarding the identity of the victim. Officers will continue to search tomorrow with the help of relevant parties.
"The search will continue tomorrow. The firefighters are assisted by 112 officers, related parties," he concluded.
